postReview.title: Chelsea 1-0 Manchester United: Cucurella earns huge win in Champions League race
postReview.description: Chelsea edged closer to a return to the Champions League after battling to a win over Manchester United in a nervy game at Stamford Bridge.

preReview.title: Preview: European finalists Chelsea and Man United clash on Friday night

QAData.question: Who won between Chelsea and Manchester United on Fri, 16 May 2025 19:15:00 GMT?
QAData.answer: Chelsea won 1–0 over Manchester United on Fri, 16 May 2025 19:15:00 GMT.

funFacts.fallback: Victor Nilsson Lindelöf completed the most passes (73) in the match.
Reece James hit the woodwork 1 times in 2 total shots.
Marc Cucurella was Player of the Match with a rating of 8.5.
Rasmus Højlund has the least touches (26) of any outfield player.
Patrick Dorgu won the most duels (10) in the match.
